basic.Peptide Name: SpHyastatin (antimicrobial protein; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Active against Gram- bacteria P.  stutzeri, P. fluorescens, A. hydrophila (MIC 0.63-2.5 uM), Gram+ M. luteus, S. aureus, C. glutamicum, M. lysodeikticus (MIC 0.63-5 uM), and yeast P. pastoris GS115 (MIC 2.5-5 uM).
